item.title: Syncing Files Using S5Cmd
item.description: Syncing Files Using S5Cmd Get S5CmdOlder versions of PowerShell (4.0) and the older AWSTools don’t have the required ability to sync down a folder from a key prefix. This also performs much more quickly for a quick sync of files like backups to a local directory for initiating restores against. In testing by the tool creator, it was shown that this could saturate a network for an EC2 with full download speed and be up to 40x faster than using CLI with the benefit of being a small self-contained Go binary.
